choices: You have reached... The Final Tournament
1.content:
You wake up to a dark and gloomy day, with storm clouds looming overhead... But for you, today is going to be a great day! Finally your chance to prove that your martial arts skills are beyond that of any female. You get yourself a big breakfast and dash out the door to head for this tournament..... Wait a second.... You don't know WHERE this tournament is! Shit, what do you do now??

You stand out front your house, feeling stupid, when you hear a strange noise from above... You look up only to see a massive whirl-hole opening in the clouds. Now this is wierd... All of a sudden, your feet lift off the ground... you're moving towards the whirl-hole! You can't stop yourself.... You try, but it is useless. You can only watch as you get closer and closer to the whirl-hole in the sky. You close your eyes as you pass through it, and you suddenly feel like you have been sucked through a large pipe. You open your eyes and all you see are random colours whooshing past... purple... yellow.... green... black... red....

You close your eyes and then you feel a thud on your back and your world stops spinning. You open your eyes....
1.title: Entering the tournament through the sky...

choices: The telling of the Rules
11.content:
You seem to be in a giant cave... rock ledges are everywhere, and the ceiling seems as if it may not even exist, as when you look up you see the caves walls extend into darkness. You walk up at a rock ledge and look over the side only to see the same thing you saw when you looked up. There was no visable floor... Just darkness... It seemed like a never ending drop.

"I am glad you could make it," a female voice calls from behind you.

You turn around to see a sexy woman wearing a completely black dobok (Taekwondo uniform). She has blonde hair and green eyes... She smiles at you.

"Where the hell am I?" You ask her.

"You are in limbo" She replies... "Half way between real life and the after life"

"What?? Why am I here?" You ask again, still confused.

"This is where The Final Tournament is held. There are only 2 ways out. Win the tournament, and you go back to your normal life. Lose, and you move on to the after life." She replies, with an evil grin on her face.

"WHAT?? No, take me back now!" You demand.

"Oh?? You're scared now? But you are a man. Surely you will beat all the girls in this tournament and go back to life the way it was, i mean, how can a man lose to a girl?" She asks, smiling while she says this.

Her words make you go silent, as she looks at you with a playful glimmer in her eye....

"Now come with me" She says, grabbing your arm.... And in an instant, you are transported to a different rock ledge.... But now you are no longer alone.
11.title: You have reached... The Final Tournament

choices: Rules Set 1: Knock Out
Rules Set 2: Submission - Kiss My Foot
Rules Set 3: To the Death
111.content:
This rock ledge is populated with girls, all dressed in different style Doboks... Some are taping their hands and feet, and others are stretching.... These girls must be your competition. Upon looking around you notice that you are bigger than every girl here. You laugh to yourself... Perhaps this will be easier than you thought. But the thought of losing to one of these girls plays on your mind. You don't want to go to the after life.

"Welcome.... To The Final Tournament...." A female voice echo's throughout the cave. You look up to a rock podium where the girl you met before now stance, her voice now amplified somehow.

"Here are the rules of this tournament..."
111.title: The telling of the Rules

choices: FIRST FIGHT vs Kendra
FIRST FIGHT vs Jessica
FIRST FIGHT vs Alice
1111.content:
1. Fights can ONLY be won by way of knock out.

2. No foreign objects can be used.

3. Upon defeat, The LOSER must worship the feet of the WINNER, and the WINNER will decide the fate of the LOSER.

4. Any fighter who is knocked off the ledge will re-spawn back into the fighting arena, but will have to take one "FREE SHOT" from the opposing fighter. (A "FREE SHOT" is a shot which is not allowed to be blocked of defended).

5. All hits are allowed.
1111.title: Tournament Rules: Knock Out

choices: You roll away and jump up.... That was a close call
Down comes the foot right on your face.... This is NOT good
11112.content:
"Let The Final Tournament commence!" The females voice echo'd throughout the cave walls.

"The first fight.... The Male vs.... JESSICA".... The voice says.

So you are to be referred to as "the male"?? You will show them what a male can do! You are teleported to a lower ledge where you stand alone. You look up and see females surrounding the edges of the upper rock ledges, looking down at you. Then you hear a noise in front of you, and you see your first opponent... Jessica... A sexy sassy young blonde girl.

"So you're the pathetic male that thinks he can't beat any girl huh?" Jessica said, looking across at you with an evil glare.

"Yeah, that is me... And i will show you that my level is higher than yours!" You say, getting into combat stance.

"Please spare me.... Your fighting level is right where you will be... unconcious at my feet" Jessica replies, getting into a stance of her own.

"FIGHT" The female voice echo's, and cheers can be heard from above as you and Jessica circle each other, waiting to make a first move.

You move in to deliver a solid right punch when your stomach is met with a powerful frontal kick... Not expecting the hit, you double over in pain, looking up only to see that a second frontal kick is being aimed right at your face.... WHACK....

Jessica's frontal kick to your face sends you crashing to the ground on your back... the crowd goes wild as you lay there, dizzy and confused... How did she do that???

You look up from your back to see Jessica standing over you....

"Well this has been fun, but it was nice knowing you..... Worm" She says, as she lifts her foot over your face..... Oh shit... She is going to choke you out under her bare foot.... You quickly try to roll away.....
11112.title: You vs Jessica

choices: Jessica falls off the edge and is re-spawned back into the arena... FREE HIT
Jessica stops just short of the edge.... Run up to her and attack!!
111121.content:
At the last second, you roll to the side and fling yourself up from your back as Jessica's bare foot hits the ground hard. That was far too close. Jessica looks across at you with a grin.

"You are far too easy.... I will enjoy making you grovel at my feet before i send you to the after life," She says laughing.

You run at Jessica and you fake a left jab, only to send a powerful roundhouse kick to her face.... She falls for your jab fake, and you feet the sole of your foot connect with the side of her face.... BINGO.

You land and see Jessica in mid air, about to hit the ground near the ledge.... If she falls off that ledge, you will get a free shot at her. And with your power, you could easily knock her out and win the match....
111121.title: A narrow escape

choices: An axe kick to the face should finish this fight pretty fast
A powerful sidekick to the face will knock her out for sure
1111211.content:
You see Jessica's body roll off the ledge and fall into the darkness..... Then a shooshing noise fills the cave and Jessica re-spawns in the middle of the fighting arena..... A female voice can be heard echoing throught the cave...

"OUT OF BOUNDS..... FREE HIT"....

Yes!!! You know that it is game over, and looking across at Jessica's face, so does she.....

"What was it you said to me.... You look forward to making me grovel at your feet before you send me to the after life?... Well i don't think that is going to happen bitch" You say, with a cocky grin on your face.

Jessica is speechless.... You laugh at her, as you walk up to her to take your free hit...
1111211.title: Jessica falls off the edge and is re-spawned ba...

choices: "AFTER LIFE" You yell
"BACK TO EARTH" You say
11112111.content:
You raise your bare foot high in the air and Jessica gets a look of fear in her eyes....... Puasing for a second just to prolong her fear and embarrasment... Then you quickly drop your foot hard, allowing it to connect with her face....

Jessica drops to the ground hard... Out cold... YES, you showed her you are not a male to mess with!

"VICTORY.... THE MALE" the voice echo's.

You slap Jessica's unconcious face with your bare foot... "wake up sleepy head" you taunt her... She slowly awakens...

"Now KISS the foot that just knocked you out cold bitch!" you say with agression in your eyes.

Having no choice, Jessica leans forward and begins to kiss your feet... You laugh at her. She doubted your abilities, and now she is kissing your mighty bare toes. Suddenly, the female voice comes back...

"MALE.... CHOOSE JESSICA'S FATE.... RETURN HER TO EARTH OR SEND HER TO THE AFTER LIFE"

You wait to make your decision.... Mainly because Jessica has to keep sucking your toes until you decide....

Finally, you come to your decision...
11112111.title: K.O

choices: YOU vs SUSAN... (Jessica was her sister... She is NOT happy with you!!!)
YOU vs ALICE... (She is just straight evil...)
111121111.content:
"NOOOOO" Jessica screams, but then in a burst of smoke, she is gone... Gone to the After Life.

The female voice booms again,

"THAT WAS VERY INCONSIDERATE OF YOU MALE..... BECAUSE OF THAT, YOUR NEXT OPPONENT WILL BE ONE WITH NO MERCY"

"Whatever," you reply. "I will beat any girl you put in front of me..."

Another wooshing sound comes out of the silence, and then you see your next opponent looking back at you with vengeful eyes...
111121111.title: "AFTER LIFE" You yell

choices: YOU vs KENDRA (A good fighter with a gentle heart)
YOU vs SUSAN (Enjoys humiliating men, but you were nice to her sister)
111121112.content:
Jessica looks at you... her eyes have changed....

"Th... Thank you..." she manages to say, before she disappears into thin air.

The female voice fills the cave once more...

"THAT WAS A NICE THING TO DO MALE, FOR THAT, YOUR NEXT OPPONENT WILL BE LESS EVIL, BUT STILL DANEROUS. DO NOT UNDERESTIMATE HER..."

With another wooshing sound, your next opponent appears before your eyes....
111121112.title: "BACK TO EARTH" You say

choices: She won't use her hands/arms to attack you during the fight.
She won't use her feet/legs to attack you during the fight.
1111211122.content:
You stare in awe at the stunning young woman who appears before you. She had long blond hair that flowed beautifully down her back just like Jessica's, and her physical features were quite similar as well. However, this girl had a much more mature appearance, with bigger breasts and a more curvy figure than your previous opponent. Her entire image radiated with perfection, and you almost began to drool as you gazed upon this figure of feminine flawlessness. You finally directed your wandering eyes to her gorgeous face as you heard her speak.

"Hey! I must say, I'm quite impressed by your abilities. There aren't many men in the world who can manage to get the best of my little sister in a battle, after all."

You began to blush as you were complemented by the goddess standing before you.

"Well, thank you very much Miss... I don't know what to say..."

Seeing you so flustered, your opponent simply giggled.

"Wow, I guess you really are a man through and through... My name is Susan, and like I said before, I'm Jessica's older sister. And if you thought that she was tough, just you wait. I'm on a whole other level compared to my little sister. While I would normally waste no time tearing you limb from limb, you were kind enough to show mercy on Jessica after defeating her. To show my appreciation for that, I suppose I'll go easy on you... Just this once, of course..."

While you didn't like the idea of your opponent going easy on you in a fight, you knew that if Susan was any stronger of a fighter than her sister, then you would need every advantage you could get. That last fight certainly taught you a thing or two about underestimating the opponents in this tournament, and since losing here could cost you your life, you didn't want to take any chances. Nodding, you graciously accept Susan's offer of a handicap before getting back into your fighting stance again. Amazingly, you felt all the injuries you sustained during your battle with Jessica healing themselves instantaneously. Getting into position herself, Susan smirks at you and speaks again.

"Alright then, let's get started! To make things a bit more interesting, I'll fight you without ever using my _____ to attack you. Still, you'd better not underestimate me just because I'm fighting with a handicap. I'm a lot stronger than my little sister Jessica was, so I don't want to see you pulling any punches! You'd better come at me with everything you've got, or I can guarantee that you won't even last 2 minutes in the ring with me!"

You knew better than to underestimate her after what you had been through in the last match. You could tell that she wasn't bluffing when she said how strong she was, and you knew that if you were going to have any hope of coming out on top, you would need to go all out against this sexy fighter. And as much as you hated to admit it, you weren't sure if you would be able to do that against such a beautiful young woman. Still, now wasn't the time to be distracted by a flawless figure. Your life was on the line here, and you had to do anything it took to survive. Hearing the bell to signal the start of the match, both you and Susan begin to charge at each other with fire burning in your eyes.



(Before we continue, what handicap had Susan imposed on herself?)
1111211122.title: A Handicap Match Against Susan

choices: Her strength has shattered your pride as you address her as queen.
You resolve to babyshake her as you continue to fight.
11112111221.content:
"Now, watch as I place both arms behind my back!'

You watch as Susan handicaps herself and to be quite honest, you see it as insulting that she now underestimates you to this extent.

You begin to rush at her only to get a barefoot shoved in your face as a reward.

As you stumble backwards, you see Susan go on the offense. She lands a devastating knee to your stomach, causing the wind to be knocked out of you. Susan is far from merciful and gives you no time to recover as she lands another kick to your face. You cant believe that you're being dominated to this extent. You try to gain distance but Susan once again keeps you in her range by landing yet another kick, this time to your ribs.

"Is this all a man is capable of? Hell, I doubt I'd even have to use both legs to take care of pathetic scum like yourself. I would probably put you out of your misery if you didn't spare my sister. So, luckily for you, I will send you back to Earth, but you'll be calling me a Queen as you kiss my feet when this is over. I'm rather impatient so, I'm going to end this in a minute."

She charges at you once more. You try to block her attacks but she's too fast. Her left leg smashes into your kidney as her right knocks you to the ground. She raises her foot above your face and almost takes you out there if it wasn't for your quick reflexes allowing you to dodge. You've taken Susan off guard now and proceed to land three devastating hits to her face.

This time she tries to find distance.

"What was that about a minute? It looks like I'm going to babyshake you now."

"Don't get too cocky, you pathetic male."

With a new burst of speed she charges into you. Still deploying her restriction she only uses her legs as sends a combo into your torso. You stumble backwards and she lands yet another kick to your face, leaving you on the floor.

"I'm going to give you a choice, male. You can either give up, call me Queen Susan, and crawl over to my feet to suck these toes that have crushed you or I'll stop holding back and show the true extent of my power. Of course, I'll still only use my legs."
11112111221.title: She won't use her hands/arms to attack you ...

choices: A hard scorpian kick to the face knocks you out cold
A miss-directed axe kick stuns you badly, but fails to knock you out
1111212.content:
Jessica's body stops sliding an inch from the edge of the drop.... DAMMIT.... You were so close.... But one solid kick to the gut should send her flying off the ledge....

While Jessica is still down, you run at her, aiming a kick at her abdomen, but she see's you coming and grabs your foot before it can connect with her, throwing your body over the ledge.... You are falling now, and weightlessness takes over your body. Suddenly, your boddy twists in mid air, and you find yourself standing but unable to move.... You hear that female voice echo once again.

"OUT OF BOUNDS.... FREE HIT"

"No" you mutter, and it is only then that you notice Jessica... You try to move your body, but you can't... It is like somebody has wrapped invisible binding around your entire body. Jessica stops infront of you and smiles.

"Well well.... Looks like i have you right where i want you boy.... One solid kick from my powerful feet, and you will be out like a light switch. Then i get to make you worship these feet.... Just look at them," Jessica said, then she grabbed your head and made you look down.

She started modelling her bare feet, twisting them into the ground and bending them for you to see.

"Do you like what you see big boy??" She asked.... "Well you shouldn't like them, because they can do this to you!!!"...
1111212.title: Almost there!!

choices: She makes you a deal.
She chooses your fate!
11112121.content:
You watch in horror as Jessica bends her leg lifting her foot towards the sky and then brings it towards you at lightning speed.

Smack!!!

Her heel hits your forehead connecting with the force of a hammer knocking you out cold. You can just make out the announcer saying K.O. as everything goes dark.

You wake up to feeling Jessica rubbing her feet against you face. “Rise and shine loser…it time for you to worship my feet just like I promised you.” She tells you smirking.

You feel the ball of her right foot (the same one that knocked you out) graze you lips teasingly. “Kiss!” She tells you like you were a dog she was training. You try to get up but she presses her foot against your face more insistently pinning you to the ground underneath it.

Reluctantly you do as she asks giving her foot a gentle kiss. You hear her giggle amused before before relaxing the pressure on your face. “There you go." she playfully slaps your face a couple of time with the sole of her foot. "Now keep kissing until I tell you to stop!!”

You do as she tells you kissing her feet repeatedly. She smiles and sits in front of you extending her feet towards you and smirking. You continue to kiss submissively not daring to challenge the beautiful fighter again. She pretty much shattered you confidence when she knocked you out.

After several minutes of making you kiss both her feet all over, she gets your attention. “You’re not bad at this…I think you’re starting to understand where you belong.” She smiles mischievously. “But just to make certain it has sunk in...I think my feet could use a little bit of cleaning…don’t you?”

You immediately realize what she has in mind and get disgusted. You look at her pleadingly begging her not to make you do this but a dominant look from the blonde fighter quickly shuts down any resistance you considered. She gives you a light kick in the face.

“Lick!” She orders calmly.

Humiliated, you stick your tongue out and begin licking the feet that defeated you. You lick her soles, her heels, her arches, her insteps, the balls of her feet as well as her toes. She even makes you lick between her toes too. It’s not an altogether unpleasant experience. Jessica’s feet are surprisingly soft and smooth for a fighter. It’s hard to believe how powerful they actually are. Considering she was walking around barefoot, they are also not as dirty as they could have been. You guess that she must take good care of them. What really makes the task unpleasant is the psychological degradation behind it. There’s nothing lower than being forced to lick someone’s feet and your self esteem really takes a hit. You really begin feeling inferior to the sexy blonde fighter in front of you. As a result, you begin to lick her feet even more submissively. Jessica seem to notice this too and smirks.

After making you clean her feet thoroughly, Jessica makes you suck her toes. She seems to really enjoy this and moans several times as she wiggles her toes in your mouth. However her toe sucking is interrupted by the female announcer voice...

“JESSICA AS THE VICTOR OF THIS BATTLE SELECT YOUR OPPONENT’S FATE!!”

Hearing that you begin worshiping her feet even more diligently kissing them repeatedly and licking them like an obedient puppy hoping that she might show you a small amount of mercy.

“Heh heh you’re so pathetic.” She laughs mockingly. “Looks like spending some time around my feet has taken care of that pride and arrogance of yours.”

She smiles as she ponders what to do with you.

What does she decide?
11112121.title: Scorpion Kick

choices: Agree to becoming her slave.
Don give her the satisfaction. Reject her offer and take the consequences.
111121211.content:
Jessica considers. “You’re pretty good when it comes to foot worship and you even seem to like doing it” She tells you. “I’ll make you a deal. I could use a someone to pamper my feet between matches. How would you like to be my foot slave? You could worship my feet whenever I want you to, give me foot rubs before and after every match, even help me perfect my kicks by acting as my practice dummy. Maybe I'll even share you with a couple of the other female fighters and get you to worship and take care of their feet too.” She smiles. “My sister is a martial artist as well…I bet she’d love to dominate and play with you too.”

You look at her hesitantly. You don’t really want to be her footslave but at the same time you also don’t want to risk antagonizing someone who holds your fate in her hand.

Jessica seems to guess what is going through your mind. She gives a mock gasp pretending to be offended that you’re not jumping at her offer (eventhough she doesn’t really blame you) before teasingly rubbing her foot against your face. “I’ll make it really simple for you footboy. It’s either this or the afterlife.”

The color drains from your face. She wouldn’t…would she?

The blonde fighter clicks her tongue. “I hear that defeated competitors sent to the afterlife have to spend the rest of eternity there as a foot slave." She giggles playfully "Though I suppose at least you would be putting your foot worshiping skills to good use.”

You shiver. It’s basically spend the rest of your life as a footslave or the rest of eternity as one. Part of you is doesn’t want to give her the satisfaction of having you agree to be her slave but it’s a lot to sacrifice just to mildly spite her.

Jessica smiles knowing she holds all the cards. “So what’s it going to be?” She asks.
111121211.title: Jessica Offers You a Deal

choices: Give your belt to your new mistress...
Refuse!
1111212111.content: You submissively reply "yes". With a giggle Jessica says "good boy, now call me mistress Jessica!" "yes, mistress Jessica" you manage to get out with a tear streaming down your face. "don't cry, slave, you and I will have lots of fun together, starting with you stripping and giving me that pretty black belt." she says with a grin on her beautiful face.
1111212111.title: Agree to becoming her slave.

choices: Give in. Beg for mercy!
Hold strong! Don't surrender yet!
11112121112.content:
Despite having all of your pride swallowed up by this beautiful goddess, you decide enough is enough.

"No," you mutter to yourself. You don't have the balls to make eye contact with her yet.

Jessica looks down at you scornfully. "No? Really? Do I have to remind you that I have broken you - both literally and metaphorically. Minutes ago you were licking my feet like a good little puppy dog!" She smiles patronisingly at you, the corners of her mouth beginning to crease into a laugh. "You are so beneath me right now "no" doesn't quite register I'm afraid."

Arrogantly, she stands over you as you continue to lie flat on your back. "Now I'll give you another chance - beg for mercy and I'll forget about your little slip of the tongue." She places a bare foot on your chest and scrunched her soft toes eagerly; your heart is racing as you make your decision...
11112121112.title: Time to fight back!

choices: Lie back on the floor like a good puppy
Worship my feet
111121211121.content:
You know it is hopeless. This girl owns you. Literally. You decide it's best to try to get on her good side.

"Ok - ok," you stammer, gasping for breath with the pressure of her foot on your chest.

"I thought so. Now this better be the end of your pathetic attempts at resistance."

Jessica relinquishes the pressure on your chest and takes several steps back, a look of triumph glistening on her smug face.

"Now crawl!"

Meekly, you shuffle on to your knees and adopt a crawling position - much like a dog. Inside you are devastated; surely this cannot be your life now? Not long ago you were fighting this girl, confident of destroying her and winning the entire tournament. You swallow what meagre amount of pride that you have left and begin crawling slowly towards her. Jessica begins to chuckle, all the while narrowing her eyes at you, any respect she once had rapidly fading.

"Right slave...where shall we start?"
111121211121.title: Give in. Beg for mercy!

choices: Continue as you are - she'll get bored eventually
Grab her foot and begin to kiss it before she can move it away
1111212111212.content:
Like the faithful dog you have become, you grovel at Jessica's feet, your tongue lapping up the sweat from the top of her feet that she has barely broken into from kicking your ass.

"Good puppy! I knew you'd give in." Jessica arrogantly brushes her hair back and lifts her left foot up so that it arches back and tucks behind her leg. You focus on the right foot, knowing that the better job you do, the less hard she'll be on you. In theory anyway.

After a few minutes, your tongue starts to feel dry and sticky; how much more licking of the top of her foot does she want? You notice how soft her foot it is. At least you're not licking her soles! Suddenly Jessica clicks her fingers at you. The commanding nature of this automatically makes you stop and look up at her.

"What about my other foot?" She asks in an infuriatingly reasonable tone. You wait for her to swing her left foot back round from where it is resting behind her leg. Jessica begins to glower. "Well, what are you waiting for, dog?"

You realise then that she wants you to crawl over to her other foot. As if this humiliation couldn't get any worse! You take a breath and turn around to the other side of her legs where the left foot is waiting, her toes wiggling as if to mock you further. You put your face close up to this foot and stick out your tongue tentatively. You are too slow. In the blink of an eye, the foot swings back the other way.

She smiles deviously down at you. "Come on bitch!" Jessica giggles as you turn back the other way; just as you are about to plant a quick kiss on the foot in its original position she hooks it back again!

You start to feel a mild sensation of frustration bubbling. Does she want her feet worshipped or not? How long does she expect you to be going round in circles for?
1111212111212.title: Worship my feet

choices: Accept slavery - it's too risky otherwise
What the hell; nothing can be worse than this! After life it is
111121211122.content:
"NO!" This time you muster up the courage to shout at Jessica; the ferocity of your voice catches her off guard.

She regains her composure relatively quickly. "Do I have to remind you that I knocked you out cold and am the one who decides your fate? I can happily send you to the afterlife, which believe me, will NOT be as pleasant as this!"

Her smile has turned into a frown. You know you're in a tricky situation. You know from past experience that this is not a girl you want to piss off! What is better - accept your new role in life as her foot slave, or risk going to the afterlife - which could be a hell of a lot worse!
111121211122.title: Hold strong! Don't surrender yet!

choices: Start kissing her feet
Continue to whimper pathetically in front of her
1111212111221.content:
"Ok, ok - you win!" You blurt out, desperate to avoid whatever would be in store for you in the afterlife.

"Hmm," she smirks. "I want to hear you beg for mercy, like you should have done after I warned you about saying "no" to me. Or as soon as you began attempting to fight me for that matter."

Jessica stands over you expectantly. Any pride that you had briefly regained is now gone.

"Please Jessica - I beg you! Please have mercy on me!" You cry out as you feel all the fight evaporate from you completely.

"Better," she replies. "But not good enough!"

You start to panic - the thought of the after life comes hovering again in front of you. You scramble up so you are on your knees in front of her.

"Please, please, please! Jessica - you are a beautiful and incredible athlete. I was a fool to have ever thought I could compete against you. Please forgive me! Forgive me!"

The corners of Jessica's mouth begin to twitch; her eyes burn holes into you as she watches you surrender yourself to her completely. It's clear she's getting off on this.

"More begging," she orders.

It comes surprisingly easily. "Oh Jessica, you are a goddess! Please, please - I'd be honoured to be your slave! It would be such a privilege to serve at the feet of such a superior fighter! I beg you! Please, please, please! Accept my request! Make me your slave!"

Your last few sentences are mostly whimpers; she has reduced you to a pathetic mess. At least you're still alive! Utter triumph has now spread across Jessica's face. She owns you and she knows it.

"Prove it," she shrugs casually, her eyes still glistening with pleasure.
1111212111221.title: Accept slavery - it's too risky otherwise

1111212112.content:
You drag up as much dignity as you can muster and tell her, "Hell no!"

Jessica frowns at you. "Fine, then I choose your fate."

She announces into the air, "I choose for him to go to the afterlife. But not a normal afterlife, an afterlife where his every waking moment is licking feet."

You look up in horror hoping that it is not possible.

Calmly she places her lethal foot on your throat and adds pressure.

"And not just any feet. Smelly feet. And while you lick them, other feet step on you and torture you."

Your eyes bulge as her pressure chokes the life out of you.

"Ta ta foot bitch."

The last thing you see in this life is her triumphantly staring down at you.

** THE AFTER LIFE **

You wake up and realize you can not move your body from the neck down.

You look up in horror to a dozen feet. The stench makes you want to throw up but you are compelled to stick out your tongue and begin to lick the grimy nasty feet above you.

You try to make yourself stop but try as you might you can not. Tears leak the side of your face as you realize you are in the afterlife. Just as you thought it couldn't get worse you see a line of women out of the corner of your eye. They are marching toward you.

All sizes, some big some small, black white and Asian all are walking toward you. Some wear boots some wear heels and some are barefoot. The first comes to you and steps full weight on your stomach. The pain is excruciating, even though she looks thin it feels like she weights 800 pounds.

"Gahhh!", you yell out, unsure of how much more pain you can take at the feet of Alexa. You couldn't seem to find a weakness, and it was only a matter of time before she finally ended you! Alexa seemed frustrated as well as she stumbled back, looking over her legs and perfect deadly feet for a moment, giving a smirk that your exchange seemed to favor her.

"That's it boy", she said hauntingly. "I have had about enough of this, I didn't think I would have to use this form in a long time!", Alexa practically growls, digging her feet in and focusing hard, before bursting into a force of energy and power. Static and light emulated from her,causing you to fall back stunned as she transformed. Her hair and body grew glittery and exuded power. Her hair became longer, and more elegant and her body became completely naked for a moment, her normal fighting outfit being replaced by a heavenly pair of silky pantyhose. The energy faded, and Alexa stood, still exuding power and flexing her toes in her silky pantyhose. She had gone Super Femme!

"I hope you have a trick or two up your sleeve boy, or else it is over!", Alexa said, kicking at you.
1113321211112.title: Your kick is more powerful, and sends Alexa stu...

111332121112.content:
Your energy vanishes too quickly and you're unable to stop Alexa... You drop to your knees as Alexa laughs at you.

"Are you scared of my powers now??" Alexa asks you with a mischievous grin.

You are genuinely speechless for two reasons. Firstly, because you are actually scared now... And secondly, because you don't even have the energy to reply. Alexa laughs harder as she extends her foot to your face and gives your face a gentle nudge. The soft nudge is enough to send you falling to your back where you now look up at Alexa with fear in your eyes. Alexa’s bare foot now comes over your stunned face and presses down, pinning your face to the ground…. And Alexa’s voice echo’s as she speaks down to you…

“Yes boy... You are going to die now. And you are going to feel a great deal of pain before you do finally die…” She says, pushing her foot harder down on your face. You grunt in agony, feeling her foot suck the life out of your face.

“I love to feel your pain….” She says sadistically, as her toes tense up, pushing harder on your face…. The pain is unbearable, and you feel yourself growing weaker... And weaker... And weaker...

“This pain is nothing compared to the pain you will receive in the after life!” Alexa says, with a laugh. She then begins to twist her foot into your face, prolonging the humiliating and teasing you before her foot sucks out the rest of your energy and takes your life.

“Just think about this boy… The last thing you will EVER feel… Will be the sole of my powerful and deadly foot, crushing your pathetic face and literally sucking the life right out of it”… As Alexa says this, her foot twists harder, grinding down onto your face… You wish it would just end… Then suddenly Alexa’s foot lifts off your face… You are now so weak that you can no longer move at all. Another few seconds of Alexa's bare foot on your face, and your life will be completely sucked out. You look up at her, and she leans down to you and speaks in a whisper….

“Boy… Do me a favor… When you get to the after life, tell them that you were killed by the feet of the sexy and all powerful Alexandra…..” Alexa whispers…

You watch as she stands up again, the evil grin still on her beautiful face.

…. “Now DIE” She yells…

Alexa then puts her foot back on your face, laughing as she does it… You feel your life fade away and darkness starts to take over. But Alexa wants to cause you more pain and humiliation before you finally die. She wriggles her toes in your face, the red nail polish flickering once more, then she pushes down with a great force. Instantly, you feel your jaw snap and crack.

“AHHHHH NOOOOO” You cry out… But your screams are only muffled by Alexa’s laughs…

Your vision starts to fade as Alexa twists her foot, grinding it into the remains of your broken jaw… You life is sucked away completely, and Alexa simply wriggles her toes in your face as she feels your life slip away… And as darkness takes you over, she says one last good bye….

“Enjoy the after life foot slave!”
111332121112.title: Sucking the life out of you!

You now are looking at the powerful and deadly Alexa, and she is standing above you with an evil grin on her face… Your eyes widen in fear… Alexa’s bare foot comes over your stunned face and presses down, pinning your face to the ground…. You watch as she stands up again, the evil grin still on her beautiful face.

…. “Now DIE” She yells…

Alexa then raises her foot behind her body, like a ballerina of some kind… Her back arches and her hands spread a bit to give her balance… Until her foot comes to a stop well above her head…

You are forced to look into her eyes as she looks down on you with a sadistic smile.

“Enjoy the after life foot slave!” She says.

And then she brings her foot down fast, just like a whip, and the top of her foot connects with your temple hard… And then everything goes black, like somebody just turned out a light…. And all you hear is Alexa’s laughter in the darkness, and you begin your decent into the after life where you will serve for eternity as a foot slave…
11133212112.title: The kick knocks out out... You awaken to Alexa ...

As she looks down on you, an evil grin comes over her face… Your eyes widen in fear… Alexa’s bare foot comes over your stunned face and presses down, pinning your face to the ground…. And Alexa’s voice echo’s as she speaks down to you…

Alexa then slowly raises her knee, hovering her foot above your face… She points her toes, allowing you to see every angle of her perfect bare foot… The same bare foot that is about to end your life. You can’t help but to admire it’s beauty, even though you are about to die. The red polish, perfect arch… How can something so beautiful be so deadly?

“Enjoy the after life foot slave” Alexa says…

She then sends her foot crashing down into your face like a guillotine, and her power it concentrated purely onto her toes… They hit your face hard, and very precisely, causing your face to break instantly.

“AHHHHHHHHHHH” you scream out in excruciating pain… Alexa leaves her foot there as you bleed internally and your vision fades… The last thing you see before your life slips away in Alexa’s bare foot… the same foot you were admiring only 10 seconds ago…
1113321212.title: Bad Idea...

111332122.content:

You fall hard onto your back… the world spins all around you… What a powerful hit… Your whole body is aching with pain. You honestly have no idea where you are for a few seconds. That is of course until your vision starts to clear and you see Alexa standing above you with an evil grin on her face… Your eyes widen in fear… Alexa’s bare foot comes over your stunned face and presses down, pinning your face to the ground…. Alexa’s body then jumps up and over your face… And time seems to stop.

You look up at the evil Goddess that is now above your face, and you see her feet come together… You can’t help but look at her feet as she presses her soles together. Then she pulls back her toes, making the shape of a butterfly. You can not help but to admire the beauty of the butterfly that her deadly toes have just formed. You look up in amazement as time still seems to stand still…

But then, as if time just decided to start again, the same butterfly you were admiring comes rushing down to your face, followed by the force of Alexa’s entire body crashing down onto you. As soon as her feet impact against your head, darkness comes… But even in the darkness, as you move on to the after life, you can still see the faint outline… Of a butterfly…..
111332122.title: The Butterfly Wings

Your meditation is almost complete when you feel Alexa's foot slam into your dislocated jaw, sending an agonizing pain through your face. Alexa laughs as she watches you fall to the ground at her feet.

You fall hard onto your back… the world spins all around you… What a powerful hit… Your whole body is aching with pain. You honestly have no idea where you are for a few seconds. info.brief_description: You enter a martial arts tournament filled with girls... Based on the work of MartinXManga
info.description:
(NOTE: i edited some chapters in the Alexa fight to the death... Have a look :) )

This story is based on the work of MartinXManga (who i am a HUGE fan of). His work is amazing, and he is a good friend of mine as well. Please check out his website to see all of the characters that appear in this story: http://martinxmanga.atspace.com/index.html

You are a trained fighter, and a VERY good one at that... However you believe your fighting skills are superior to any woman. After all, women are slower and weaker than men, right?? And with a fighting level like yours, no girl could EVER beat you...

One night you are on your computer looking at martial arts websites when you stumble across a girl who posts in forums about how she can beat "ANY MAN" in a fight. So you get her into an Instant Messaging window and begin to talk with her. Your arguement gets pretty heated, and she tells you about an all female martial arts tournament that is held. She says that she is entering it, and that you should enter too and see just how tough you are.

You accept her challenge...

CHARACTERS:

Kendra: A Beautiful red haired girl... She is a good hearted girl who is in this tournament to fight and win. Although she does enjoy making her opponents worship her perfect feet after she defeats them.

Alexandra (or Alexa): A sexy but evil brunette... She is an AMAZING fighter and he even has some evil dark powers... But she is not just here to win. Alexa wants to kill every opponent she faces and collect their soul. She loves inflicting pain and humiliation, and nothing gives her more pleasure than you crush her opponents to death under her sexy feet.

Jessica: A young blonde girl who is new to the martial arts scene, but she is deadly. Jessica is very fast and hit hits carry a lot of force. She is also a bit of a feminist nazi, so she really enjoys putting men in their rightful place... AT HER FEET.

Susan: This red head is just straight up dangerous... You do not want to face her. She is Jessica's older sister, and she is fast and powerful like Jessica, but with more of a martial arts knowledge. Like Jessica, she hates men. If you do manage to defeat Jessica, you WILL have to answer to the feet of Susan.

Sasha: Blonde hair, blue eyes, a sweet looking girl. But this girl is pure evil, and so is her twin sister Nisha. Sasha is experienced, and she is used to fighting in tournaments where the winner humiliates the loser with her feet. So after she beats you, she will have no problems doing the same to you.

Nisha: Exactly like Sasha, blonde hair and blue eyes, but as evil as you can get. Like Sasha, Nisha will enjoy kicking you to the ground and humiliating you under her feet. But also know that if you mess around with this girl, you may end up in a 2 on 1 battle with her and Sasha, which will mean 2 pairs of feet to destroy you and humiliate you!

Alice: Black hair, dark eyes, tribal tattoos, this girl is going to be the end of you. When she beats you, she doesn’t just want to win, she wants to destroy you under her perfect bare feet. You will be lucky to crawl away from a fight with Alice, let alone actually win.

(More characters will be added as Martin creates more... There are a lot more girls on his website, but i am too unfamiliar with them to add them to the story right now)

So enjoy the story, and please visit http://martinxmanga.atspace.com/index.html to see these sexy girls in action!!!
